outputs.output_descr: The piloting work will be based on the Sustainable Rural Territories concept designed by UNDP in Crimea. The concept of Sustainable Rural Territories integrates the following key elements: preservation of history, culture and traditions, a clear strategic vision, a mobilised and economically/socially active community, a respect of its environment.

This project will aim at providing advisory services for policy improvement at regional and national levels.  In order to ensure high relevance and validity of the advisory services, a list of priorities will be discussed with partners on the ground.

project_descr: Sustainable development in Crimea: transformational models for rural territories and advisory services
